fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Budget, Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
- EU development work on employment creation, inclusiveness and poverty reduction.  
- EU goal of promoting responsible business practice.  
- EU policy on civil society in development, through the priorities established in its communication " the root of democracy and sustainable development: Europe's engagement with Civil Society in external relations" (2012) 
- EU Policy Forum on Development (PFD) 
- Directly respond to EU priorities, such as those raised in the EU communication on "A stronger role of the Private Sector in Achieving Inclusive and Sustainable Growth in Developing countries " (2014) 
- EU Gender Action Plan 2016-2020
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:

- Council of Europe 
- G20/B20 
- UN  
- UN Global Compact 
-BIAC

relevant_communication:
- The IOE has partnered with the EU on a 3-year partnership project titled: "Strengthening the capacity of the International Organisation of Employers (IOE) as a global representative employers’ organisation and of national member organisations, particularly in least developed countries (LDCs)" 
- IOE publication 'Comments on the EU's external investment plan in Africa and EU Neighbourhood Countries' http://www.ioe-emp.org/index.php?id=3835 
- IOE publication 'An enabling environment for the implementation of Agenda 2030' http://www.ioe-emp.org/index.php?id=3858 
- IOE publication 'A new paradigm in Development 
Cooperation: Fragility and migration' http://www.ioe-emp.org/index.php?id=3858 
- IOE has an initiative for job creation in Africa - Jobs For Africa (www.jobsforafrica.org) 
- IOE heads the Business Mechanism of the Global Forum on Migration and Development (GFMD)
